org.youscope.plugin.controller

Class ControllerJobConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.youscope.common.job.JobConfiguration
      • org.youscope.plugin.controller.ControllerJobConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Configuration, TableProducerConfiguration

    public class ControllerJobConfiguration
extends JobConfiguration
implements TableProducerConfiguration
    This job takes takes an input from a table data producer and generates an output, i.e. acting as a contoller unit in feedback measurements.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getTypeIdentifier

        public java.lang.String getTypeIdentifier()
        Description copied from interface: Configuration
        Returns a unique identifier for this configuration type. The identifier is used to determine factories and addons to construct and configure jobs, measurements, etc., given a corresponding configuration. Make sure that the ID returned is unique. The returned identifier should conform to "XXX.YYY", where XXX stands for an identifier of the organizational unit or the person who created the configuration (e.g. ETH, Smith, Cindarella), and YYY stands for an identifier of the specific kind of configuration (e.g. AutofocusJob, PlatePosition, MicroplateMeasurement). Optionally, additional hierarchy levels can be defined by additional separators ., e.g. "YouScope.AutofocusJob.Version1.1" The identifier should not contain spaces, non-ASCII characters, or colons (except for hierarchy level separation). Identifiers should start with a capital character, i.e. A-Z. Make sure to not use the same identifier for different configurations, since this might result in unexpected behavior or errors. Make
        Specified by:
        getTypeIdentifier in interface Configuration
        Returns:
        Unique identifier of the configuration type.

      • getInputJob

        public JobConfiguration getInputJob()
        Returns the job which is used to produce the input for the controller. It is guaranteed that this job implements the TableDataProducerConfiguration interface.
        Returns:
        Table data producing used as input, or null.

      • setInputJob

        public void setInputJob(JobConfiguration inputJob)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the job which should be used to create the table data used as input for the controller. The job must implement TableProducerConfiguration. If this is not given, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        inputJob - Table data producing job for control algorithm, or null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If inputJob does not implement TableDataProducerConfiguration.

      • getOutputJob

        public JobConfiguration getOutputJob()
        Returns the job which is used to consume the output of the controller. It is guaranteed that this job implements the OutputConsumerConfiguration interface.
        Returns:
        Output consumer job configuration, or null.

      • setOutputJob

        public void setOutputJob(JobConfiguration outputJob)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the job which should be used to consume the output from the controller. The job must implement TableConsumerConfiguration. If this is not given, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        outputJob - output consumer job configuration, or null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If outputJob does not implement TableConsumerConfiguration.

      • getProducedTableDefinition

        public TableDefinition getProducedTableDefinition()
        Description copied from interface: TableProducerConfiguration
        Returns the definition of the table layout of the tables produced by this producer, e.g. the number and types of its columns. This function should return the same TableDefinition as is returned by a measurement component created by this configuration, see TableProducer.getProducedTableDefinition().
        Specified by:
        getProducedTableDefinition in interface TableProducerConfiguration
        Returns:
        Information about of the produced tables.

      • setControllerScript

        public void setControllerScript(java.lang.String controllerScript)
        Sets the script of the controller, i.e. how the controller sets the outputs depending on the inputs.
        Parameters:
        controllerScript - The script to set.

      • setControllerTableSaveName

        public void setControllerTableSaveName(java.lang.String controllerTableSaveName)
        Sets the name of the file (without file extension) under which the input/output data of the controller should be saved.
        Parameters:
        controllerTableSaveName - Name of the file (without extension) for controller I/O saving, or null if it should not be saved.

      • getControllerTableSaveName

        public java.lang.String getControllerTableSaveName()
        Returns the name of the file (without file extension) under which the input/output data of the controller should be saved.
        Returns:
        Name of the file (without extension) where the controller I/O is saved, or null if it is not saved.

      • checkConfiguration

        public void checkConfiguration()
                        throws ConfigurationException
        Description copied from interface: Configuration
        Checks the current state of the configuration. If the configuration state is valid, the method returns normally. If not, a ConfigurationException is thrown describing the error, and what has to be changed in the configuration, by the user, such that it becomes valid. This error can then e.g. be displayed to the user (see ConfigurationAddonTools.displayConfigurationInvalid(ConfigurationException, YouScopeClient).
        Specified by:
        checkConfiguration in interface Configuration
        Overrides:
        checkConfiguration in class JobConfiguration
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException
